description:
How should you keep up with the Python backend now that React has become the standard for the frontend? Learn how to support GraphQL and Relay specs for collaboration with the frontend.

Kang Jung-seok
I work as a software engineer at RabbleUp Inc. After being introduced to programming in Python, I am loving and using it constantly.

related_urls.label: Coexistence with Relay on Django React

title: Symbiosis with PyCon KR 2023 Relay on Django React Kang Jeong-seok
